title: Grounded Theory-Based Mobile Medical Education Model Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Delivery of smartphone-based learning content with enhanced practical simulations and case study analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four stages (plan-execute-evaluate-improve) of a grounded theory-based medical education model.
Learners design diagnostic processes with over 80% accuracy using medical case analysis tools provided in a mobile environment.
Learners propose improvements for at least three out of 33 subcategories of a medical education model based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
